Subject: Open Elective course in 8" Semester

B.Tech. Final Year students are required to register for an Open Elective course in the
Eight Semester. Open Elective course is to be chosen from other Departments, i.e. other
than the branch of specialization of the student. List of Open Elective courses offered by

different Departments is attached herewith.

Students are required to submit their preferences of Open Elective courses latest by

07.01.2026 through the link given below:

Google Link QR Code

https://forms.gle/D4FoxwpsnFT6aXjh8
